name: Slikoban
description:
Slikoban is Sokoban game. Move the cubes to their correct locations and solve the levels.


Great gameplay experience.

Features:
30 hand-crafted levels with increasing complexity(Can you solve them all? ).
Originally composed Soundtracks.
Beautiful minimalist aesthetic.
Playable with mouse and keyboard.
Isometric and perspective camera modes.
Color palette change.
Unlimited undo moves.
